Text: It's been an honor to get to know Stacey. When working together at RBC, Stacey's commitment to peer development around complex digital transformation and AI topics made a huge difference in our Digital Fluency/AI Fluency program; Stacey made insightful comments and asked generative questions during our sessions, as well as giving 'case in point' examples from the field. I also had the pleasure of joining the internal agile coaching group she spearheads, which brought the theoretical into the practical for RBC team members.
Steve and his team at Three Wise Men do a great job of creating enterprise grade business applications in Enterprise Java.

Steve is one of our key suppliers and partners. He has a high level of integrety which is vital in business today. I think he came out of the womb writing computer code. Whether he's helping large international companies or small local ones, he brings innovated software development solutions to complex problem and makes it look effortless.

Job Title: Head of Corporate Sales and Service
Text: Steven is an extremely professional and competent person. I would not hesitate to refer Steven Vetzal and his company Three Wise Men to anyone.
